notes: Phase 7 downstream A/B task suite (LLM) for Django.
Tasks reference structural ground-truth queries in benchmarks/python/django_structural_queries.json via query_id.
The goal is to compare answer quality when the model is given rg-derived context vs TLDR-derived context under a fixed context budget.
